## Processing Data

```{r}
Tickets_data <-
  read_csv(
    file = "Police_Annual Statistical_Report_Tickets_Issued.csv",
    show_col_types = FALSE
  )
```

```{r}
head(Tickets_data)
```


```{r}
Tickets_data <-
  clean_names(Tickets_data)

head(Tickets_data)
```

```{r}
Tickets_data <-
  Tickets_data |>
  select(
    offence_year,
    division
  )

head(cleaned_elections_data)
```

```{r}
names(Tickets_data)
```

```{r}
Tickets_data$offence_year |>
  unique()
```

```{r}
Tickets_data$division |>
  unique()
```

```{r}
Tickets_data |>
  count(division)
```

```{r}
Tickets_data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = division)) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(x = "Division", y = "Number of Tickets") 
```

```{r}
Tickets_data |>
  ggplot(aes(x = offence_year)) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Number of Tickets") 
```
